# API Reference for cdktf.AppOptions

   AppOptions <a name="AppOptions" id="cdktf.AppOptions"></a>
  
  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.AppOptions.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```python
  import cdktf
  
  cdktf.AppOptions(
    context: typing.Mapping[typing.Any] = None,
    outdir: str = None,
    skip_validation: bool = None,
    stack_traces: bool = None
  )
  ```
  
  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.AppOptions.property.context">context</a></code> | <code>typing.Mapping[typing.Any]</code> | Additional context values for the application. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.AppOptions.property.outdir">outdir</a></code> | <code>str</code> | The directory to output Terraform resources. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.AppOptions.property.skipValidation">skip_validation</a></code> | <code>bool</code> | Whether to skip the validation during synthesis of the app. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.AppOptions.property.stackTraces">stack_traces</a></code> | <code>bool</code> | *No description.* |
  
  ---
  
  ## `context`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="context" id="cdktf.AppOptions.property.context"></a>
  
  ```python
  context: typing.Mapping[typing.Any]
  ```
  
  - *Type:* typing.Mapping[typing.Any]
  - *Default:* no additional context
  
  Additional context values for the application.
  
  Context set by the CLI or the `context` key in `cdktf.json` has precedence.
  
  Context can be read from any construct using `node.getContext(key)`.
  
  ---
  
  ## `outdir`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="outdir" id="cdktf.AppOptions.property.outdir"></a>
  
  ```python
  outdir: str
  ```
  
  - *Type:* str
  - *Default:* CDKTF_OUTDIR if defined, otherwise "cdktf.out"
  
  The directory to output Terraform resources.
  
  ---
  
  ## `skip_validation`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="skip_validation" id="cdktf.AppOptions.property.skipValidation"></a>
  
  ```python
  skip_validation: bool
  ```
  
  - *Type:* bool
  - *Default:* false
  
  Whether to skip the validation during synthesis of the app.
  
  ---
  
  ## `stack_traces`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="stack_traces" id="cdktf.AppOptions.property.stackTraces"></a>
  
  ```python
  stack_traces: bool
  ```
  
  - *Type:* bool
  
  ---
